artist: Artist: Patrick Hughes; Author: Paul Hammond; Publisher: Prints published by Coriander Studio, London; Publisher: Book published by W.H. Allen & Co., London
creditline: Gift of funds from Emily Mason and Wolf Kahn
description: a folio in 3 parts, contained in a cardboard box; Part I- hand colored screenprint of a rainbow; Part 2- six screenprints; Part 3- Upon the Pun: Dual Meaning in Words and Pictures, by Paul Hammond and Patrick Hughes, book, London, W.H. Allen, 1978, 128 pp.
portfolio: From The Domestic Life of the Rainbow
provenance: Martin S. Ackerman Foudnation, New York (agent); given to MIA, 1980.
title: Upon the Pun: Dual Meaning in Words and Pictures
